case.title: Has detail section
case.description: Hides or displays the Detail section of the report.

case.title: Columns in report
case.description: Sets the number of columns that will appear in the Group and Detail sections of the report.

case.title: Balance column height
case.description: Whether to balance the height of columns when printing more than one column.

case.title: Don't lock table
case.description: Whether to lock the table that is providing data for the report when previewing or printing the report.

case.title: Has report header
case.description: Hides or displays the Report Header section of the report.

case.title: Has page header
case.description: Hides or displays the Page Header section of the report.

case.title: Has continuation header
case.description: Hides or displays the report's Continuation Header section.

case.title: Has report footer
case.description: Hides or displays the Report Footer section of the report.

case.title: Has page footer
case.description: Hides or displays the Page Footer section of the report.

case.title: Has continuation footer
case.description: Hides or displays the Continuation Footer section of the report.

case.title: Left Margin
case.description: The space between the left edge of the paper and the printed report.

case.title: Right Margin
case.description: The space between the right edge of the paper and the printed report.

case.title: Top Margin
case.description: The space between the top edge of the paper and the printed report.

case.title: Bottom Margin
case.description: The space between the bottom edge of the paper and the printed report.

case.title: Page Layout
case.description: Sets page orientation to "Portrait" or "Landscape".

case.title: Size
case.description: Selects a page format.

case.title: Width
case.description: Sets the width for a custom page size.

case.title: Height
case.description: Sets the height for a custom page size.

case.title: Overflow Data
case.description: Allows you to determine how to handle data that does not fit on a page. The options are:
"Prompt the user at print time"
"Trim (do not print) overflow data"
"Shrink data to fit on page"
"Print the overflow data on additional pages"

case.title: Printer Selection
case.description: Enables and disables the Printer drop-down list box.

case.title: Printer
case.description: Which printer to use.

case.title: Paper bin
case.description: Which paper bin on the printer to use.

case.title: Saved Properties
case.description: Refer to Setting Printer Options at Run Time.

case.title: Show printer setup
case.description: Whether the user should see the Print Setup dialog.

case.title: Print to file
case.description: The name of the print file to create.

case.title: Left, Top
case.description: Sets the left and top coordinates of the window.

case.title: Width, Height
case.description: Sets the width and height dimensions of the window.

case.title: Mode and Value
case.description: If the mode of any of the Position or Size values is set to "Percentage", then the value is interpreted as a percentage of the Alpha Five window. In all other cases, the values are in inches. If the mode of any of the Position or Size values is set to "Percentage", then the property setting is then "Percent". If the mode is set to "Inches" or "Cm", the value of the property setting is then "Absolute". If the mode is set to "Default, the value of the property setting is "Default". In this case the size of the form is set by the size of the form in the design window. If the mode is set to "Use Form Width" or "Use Form Height", the value of the property setting is "Form". In this case the size of the form is set by the size of the design window.

case.title: Sizeable
case.description: When checked, the user can resize the report window.

case.title: System Menu
case.description: When checked, there is a system menu in the upper left corner of the report window.

case.title: Minimize Button
case.description: When checked, there is a minimize button in the upper right corner of the report window.

case.title: Maximize Button
case.description: When checked, there is a maximize button in the upper right corner of the report window.

case.title: Has Caption
case.description: When checked, the caption field is enabled.

case.title: Caption
case.description: The name of the report window.

case.title: Frame Style
case.description: Sets the style of the window to "Normal" (modeless), "Dialog" (modal), or "Tool" (?).

case.title: Menu
case.description: Sets the menu that appears when previewing a report.

case.title: Toolbar
case.description: Sets the toolbar that appears when previewing a report.
